Cloudwoven Robes.description: Robes woven from condensed cloud material, providing light yet powerful protection

Wind Charm.description: A charm imbued with the essence of the wind, increasing speed and agility

Storm Eye.description: A mystical eye that allows the wearer to see through storm and fog

Cloud Essence.description: Condensed cloud energy that restores MP and grants temporary levitation

Storm Elixir.description: Grants the power of the storm, increasing lightning damage for a duration

Star Dust.description: Magical stardust that restores health and grants a brief invulnerability

Storm Crystal.description: A crystallized piece of storm energy, crackling with electricity

Celestial Feather.description: A feather from a celestial bird, glowing with starlight

Star Shard.description: A fragment of fallen star, radiating celestial energy
